body.name: Lume Triple Milled Soap - Rich Moisture & Gentle Cleansing - Paraben Free, Phthalate Free, Skin Safe - 5 ounce (Clean Tangerine)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 16 hrs 24 mins
features: RICH MOISTURE - Super sudsy and gentle, our soap leaves your skin moisturized and feeling fine.

LUXURIOUS LATHER - Through a triple milling process, this high quality soap has had excess air and water removed, resulting in a dense, long lasting bar with a rich, creamy lather. It's great for shaving too.
GENTLE CLEANSE - Cleanses odor like traditional soap but doesn't control odor like our Acidified Body Wash.

SKIN LOVING INGREDIENTS - Free from SLS (sodium lauryl sulfate), parabens, phthalates, and artificial dyes. Doctor developed - hypoallergenic and safe for all external use. Made from Mass Balance Sustainable Palm Oil.
CLEAN TANGERINE - With sparkling, bright, citrus notes, this sweet and fruity scent is pure sunshine.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Show Your Skin Some Love Lume’s luxurious soap is triple milled, which means it has been through a process that removes extra water and air. Three times! The resulting bar is dense and long lasting with a rich, creamy lather. Made with skin loving ingredients that gently cleanse while leaving your skin moisturized and feeling fine.

Previous page Works Everywhere Cleanses your whole body —from your face to your feet. Works Harder Gentle cleansing with a moisturizing formula that keeps skin feeling fine. Works Smarter Triple milled to create a dense, long lasting bar with a rich, creamy lather. Works Safely Doctor developed and safe for ALL your odor prone areas. Free of parabens, phthalates and dyes. Next page Not an Ordinary Soap! 1 Works Everywhere 2 Works Harder 3 Works Smarter 4 Works Safely

Not Your Ordinary Body Care! What’s the difference between Lume Triple Milled Soap, Acidified Body Wash & Cleansing Bar? Our soap is long lasting and moisturizing. Our body wash and cleansing bar (same formula in gel or bar form) have an extra benefit in that the low pH provided by Mandelic Acid better knocks out existing odor and helps control new odor for 24 hours. Are Lume soaps vegan and cruelty free? Yes! Lume soap is vegan, cruelty free, hypoallergenic, and safe for all external use.
*2021 & 2022 odor efficacy studies conducted by Princeton Consumer Research

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for 2-Nonenal! Getting old just sucks!
reviews.reviewText: Update: 1/24/2024: Since my last update, I did some more reading about 2-Nonenal and how to get rid of the smell. Others said Persimmon soap would do the trick. So again, I go to Amazon to find it. I did find it, purchased it and tried it. It’s a very very expensive, tiny little piece of glycerin soap. Smells good. Does it work? Yes but for about 8 hours. Then you have to use it again. Lume controls the odor much longer and Lume bar of soap lasts longer. If you like citrus smell, get Lume tangerine. It’s cheaper, larger, lasts longer and works longer.Update: 1/4/2024:Since my last update, I ordered the Peony Rose and the Tangerine. The coconut smell started getting to me. When first applied, cream or soap, it reminded me of men’s dirty socks. Not feminine at all! Of course that initial stinky smell dissipates but I just couldn’t get past it. So I’ve tried both the peony rose and tangerine. Both smell really good. Believe it or not, my husband likes the peony rose the best. It leaves a smell similar to CK One on him. I’m sure body chemistry comes into play here but on him it doesn’t leave him smelling of flowers. On me, both leave a light pleasant scent. People won’t smell it on you unless they are literally sniffing your skin.The soap works just fine by itself for 2-Nonenal.Update: 12/26/23I tested using only the soap and it works! For me, at this point and time, no need to use both the soap and the cream. Saves me a little time in my hygiene routine and a little bit of money too.Original Review:I’m going to put my tragic but true story out here in hopes it helps someone. Move on to the next review if you are sensitive to the truth and facts about aging or just squeamish.Growing up I spent a lot of time with my grandmother. I always noticed her house had this certain smell and I knew it came from her but never knew what it was. I definitely knew it was a natural smell, not a perfume, lotion or detergent. It was a sweet but earthy kind of smell. Whatever it was, I knew I didn’t want it.Fast forward 43 years and here I am post menopause. I still get a little hot flash now and then but I’m definitely through the turbulence. Praise Jesus!The other morning, I was sitting in bed with my morning cup of coffee perusing on Amazon like I always do, and I could smell this sweet, musty, salty something odor coming off my neck and chest. I was like, WTH!, but in much worse language. I religiously shower 2x a day. I never get in my bed dirty. NEVER. And all of a sudden, I’m waking up with this strange odor on my body. The idea of it tormented me all day. Next morning, same problem. 😩😩😩. So over to the internet I go to try to diagnose my problem. Well, guess what? I’ve hit an all time low in my life! I officially have Old People Smell or scientifically called, 2-Nonenal. Welcome to my dark side, folks!So back to Amazon I go to find a product to cure me. I came across Lume. I even saw the tv commercial for the all body soap and deodorant. I purchased both. Last night I showered with the soap and made sure I got my back and all the cracks and crevices. I put the cream on my neck and chest. I went to bed, said my prayers, asked God to take away the old people smell. 🙏❤️🙏.So here I am, the next morning, sitting in bed with my morning coffee and writing this review. So! How do I smell this morning? Like a coconut. No old people smell. I only smell of coconut. Lume worked!Would it work for a solid 72 hours? Don’t know and don’t care because I bathe 2x day minimum. I will use the soap and cream daily.It sucks getting old. Your joints wear out, skin dries out, and now we’re doomed to get 2-Nonenal.Mentally I still feel like I’m in my early 40’s. Physically, I feel like my actual age of 58. But I REFUSE to smell like an old person. REFUSE! REFUSE! REFUSE!Pros:-Bar of soap is quite sizable and will last awhile.-It works for 2-Nonenal and possibly other reasons for body odorCons:-Tube of body cream is rather small but you don’t need much as it spreads well-Products are pricey but how can you put a price on something that gets rid of 2-Nonenal?So this is my wicked little story. I hope it helps someone and my apologies if I grossed you out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not a strong scent
reviews.reviewText: Sometimes I like strong smelling soaps and sometimes I don’t care for it. I do like that you don’t -need- it to be a strong scent because it helps to keep the BO away. I put this inside a scrubber and it’s honestly a great combo with the other LUME products. This is my new daily soap and I definitely recommend it. It doesn’t dry out the skin like other bars. I use this with the acidified body wash for the privates and face. It’s the best combo in hygiene. The lume deodorant on top of that makes it all the trifecta. Even if you don’t use other lume products, I still recommend this for your daily soap needs. My skin is clean, soft, and amazing for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This morning s a game changer for my 82 year old mom
reviews.reviewText: So as we age we gain a smell that seems to never go away with regular soap. This soap takes that smell away and when you smell it again it’s a wonderful indicator to get them another shower to apply the soap barrier again. I would scrub my bathroom and look for the smell and then I saw this on a commercial and bought it. Like night and day with mom. It’s great for her skin. It does not dry her out and is a great moisture riser as well and it suds up well too. Works great in her soap bag and is very durable. Talking about this today on our moms social media (FB) caregiver page, “The Linda Mae Way”. Thank you for making this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Decent odor control. Pleasant subtle scent. Good lather. Rinses clean. Pic shows size compared to a typical disposable razor. Perfect size for lathering without fumbling, though price is severely inflated. You’re paying for a name. Tends to be drying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best soap around!
reviews.reviewText: What’s not to love? This soap will have you smelling clean for several days. It lathers up nice and the lavender scent is great. This is the o my soap I will ever buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This soap is delicious :). It smells great!
reviews.reviewText: Lovely, lovely soap. The scent is light and bright, the bar makes loads of suds. The soap is gentle to your skin, not drying. And it seems to last a very long time. Spoil yourself!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good and lathers great
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful soap. It smells great, lathers well and makes you feel clean without any residue from other soaps. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize this soap isn't the old acidified bars. It smells like them, but the befits I'm used to aren't there. I will not buy these again.
